Been playing since OG Overwatch 1 when Mercy had mass rez. I can never find another game like Overwatch, despite the broken promises, I'm glad that it finally has new updates again like new heroes and maps. I honestly don't think the game deserves all these hate.
Es como el TF2 pero los personajes son lesbianas.

Z TM SB BX 
H L B OW1

First they take away a game I paid $60 for. Followed by removing loot boxes (free ways to get cosmetics) and replaced it with a way too over priced shop that requires real money. Along with the shop added a battlepass that you can also pay for like the rest of these annoying games nowadays. Overwatch 2 is basically OW1 with less content. The main reason OW2 was supposed to exist was for the PVE modes they said they were gonna add but eventually just abandoned entirely. From what I just saw loading up the game to have enough playtime to review it on steam, they added a handful of some sort of new pve event thing....... that you have to pay real money for. They ruined what was once an actually decent game, all for a greedy disgusting cash grab that they know die hard fans are going to play and give into anyway.

I've been playing Overwatch since 2017 and while Blizzard has a lot of issues that people will cry about non-stop, this is still the best multiplayer shooter I've ever played and making it F2P feels like a good move considering how much easier it is to convince my friends to play with me. Sorry haters!

Overwatch 2? More like Overwatch 1.1. The only difference between 1 and 2 is Blizzard putting new heroes behind a paywall, the introduction of a battle pass and the complete removal of being able to get cosmetic items at a consistent rate for free. The reason it's called Overwatch 2 is because there was going to be a massive PvE mode added to the game. When Blizzard announced that this mode had been scrapped it became quite apparent to me that they do not care about Overwatch fans. All they care about is attempting to milk as much money as they can from this IP through overpriced cosmetics and making it so if you don't spend money you have a much worse experience. Want that new hero? Pay us to get it instantly or grind for a long time to finally get it. In a competitive team based shooter, when a team doesn't even have access to the entire roster because none of them spent money that feels very pay to win to me. It's been reported that someone would have to grind 7-8 months to get one legendary skin for free. Or they can spend $23 to get it instantly. Overwatch 2 is an abomination and it represents how hard Blizzard has fallen from the company everyone used to know and love. TF2 better
